mapper.select: select d.param_id, d.unit_type, d.param_code, d.param_name, d.value_type, d.enum_options, d.min_value, d.max_value, d.scale_factor, d.bit_length, d.hardware_order, d.default_value, d.remark, v.value_id, v.unit_id, v.raw_value, v.uint_value from sys_baseband_unit u join sys_baseband_param_def d on d.unit_type = u.unit_type left join sys_baseband_param_value v on v.param_id = d.param_id and v.unit_id = u.unit_id where u.unit_id = #{unitId} order by d.hardware_order
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_baseband_param_value (unit_id, param_id, raw_value, uint_value, update_by, update_time) values
(#{item.unitId}, #{item.paramId}, #{item.rawValue}, #{item.uintValue}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime})
on duplicate key update raw_value = values(raw_value), uint_value = values(uint_value), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
